channel.title: Port fowarding
channel.description: is there any way to host your server on the server status list and have people play your server without doing the port foward thing? cause i can't go into my modem's settings and add that port thing atm, is there any way to put ur server up without adding the port to ur modem?

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

no lol i said i could use dial up instead of my regular internet cause my regular internet runs through a modem

Read full topic

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @RS2User_14561 RS2User #14561
item.description:
@RS2User_14561 wrote:

I wouldn’t use Hamachi, no matter how desperate you are. Besides, you’ve got dial up? You’re screwed. A server running on dial up will lag like hell, no matter how fast your computer is. Plus, why do you even need to port forward? You’ve got dial up, so you don’t have a router.

Pm me if you need some more help

Read full topic

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

go to http://hamachi.cc and download it. once its downloaded register a network with an easy password. then if hamachi is running and people use the ip that is on the top of your hamachi window, they should be able to get on.

ps. register it with hamachi servers

Read full topic

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

dang… well i dont like hamanchi nor do i know how to use it so i guess i’m out of luck unless i use dial up lol… anyway thx for answering my question

Read full topic

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

If you want other people to be able to play on your server you have to portfoward if you have a router. Unless you use Hamachi which I wouldnt suggest buts its kind of nice when youre really desperate.

Read full topic

not using a router? huh? do u mean no u can’t put ur server up using a router, or if your not using a router you can put ur server up… cause i have to use a router
